executable.title: Prostate Segmentation
executable.description: This filter creates a binary image that separates the prostate from other tissues on MRI images. Seed image is a label volume with non-prostate voxels set to 1, prostate voxels set to 2 (other, unknown voxels that might be either prostate or not shall be set to 0).
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the National Alliance for Medical Image Computing (NAMIC), funded by the National Institutes of Health through the NA-MIC Driving Biological Problems (DBP) Core 3.2.

double.name: beta
double.description: Control the influence of the image contents on the segmentation. If beta=0 it means that the image does not have any influence on the segmentation results. The higher the beta value, the stronger the image content restrains the diffusion.
double.label: Beta

double.name: threshold
double.description: Control the segmentation threshold. Increase value to grow the segmented area.
double.label: Threshold

image.name: seedImageFileName
image.label: Seed Image
image.description: Seed image that contains seed and background voxels
